item.title: Michael Evans Behling covers the latest issue of Cliché Magazine
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
“I have always said publicly and privately, to Chris [Nolan], that if you want me to be in a movie, I’m there. I don’t really care about the size of the part. But deep down, secretly, I was desperate to play a lead for him.”
— Cillian Murphy on playing Oppenheimer.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: Kelvin Harrison Jr. photographed by Isaac Anthony for InStyle
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Drew Barrymore has stepped down as host of this year’s MTV Movie & TV Awards, in a show of support and solidarity to the striking Writers Guild members. Barrymore will host next year’s edition of instead.
The MTV Movie & TV Awards will still continue, but will now go hostless.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
‘THE LITTLE MERMAID’ starring Halle Bailey is on-track for a $110M 4-day opening at the domestic box office, which would make it one of the biggest Memorial Day opening weekends of all-time.
(https://deadline.com/2023/05/box-office-little-mermaid-opening-projection-1235356151/…)
item.author: FilmUpdates
